input.sentences: we arrived at the wedding right on time .
we walked up and they were just coming down the aisle .
they said there vows and it was official .
they left on their honeymoon and everyone went home .
output.sentences: The wedding time had finally arrived, and everyone was excited.
The mother of the bride walked with the couple as they were coming down the aisle.
They held hands as they said their vows to the wedding official.
Everyone clapped for the new couple and they celebrated with a reception.
Once the party was over, the new couple left to get ready for their honeymoon and new home.
